document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Doom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">House </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Door </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">entered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Ladder's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">thrown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">Escape </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">varied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Dream </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">outside </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Squirrels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">play </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">Berries </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">dye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Hemlocks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">bow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Doom is the house without the door
